cards.title: Tell Us More
cards.description: Introduce us to the book's author by answering personalized questions. The more detailed your answers, the funnier the book will be!

cards.title: Pick your vibe
cards.description: Choose a theme and title from our AI's top suggestions, then pick a cover design to complete your book.

cards.title: Get the Goods
cards.description: Sit back and relax while we create a full AI-generated comedy book and deliver it straight to your doorstep.
